entries.name: TD AR-D Atk/Def 1
entries.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

entries.name: TD AR-D Atk/Def 2
entries.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

entries.description: If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

entries.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +4; 3 grants +3; 4 grants +2; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

entries.description: If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X during combat. (Calculates X based on number of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures grants +10; 3 grants +7; 4 grants +4; ≥5 grants +1. Destroyed defensive structures are not counted.)

entries.name: Armored Blow 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+2 during combat.

entries.name: Armored Blow 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat.

entries.name: Armored Blow 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.

entries.name: Ashera's Chosen
entries.description: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. If unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, grants Atk/Def+6 during combat.

entries.name: Atk/Def Bond 1
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+3 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Def Bond 2
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Def Bond 3
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Def Form 1
entries.description: Grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

entries.name: Atk/Def Form 2
entries.description: Grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5.)

entries.name: Atk/Def Form 3
entries.description: Grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7.)

entries.name: Atk/Def Push 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Def Push 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Def Push 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Def Solo 1
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Def Solo 2
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Def Solo 3
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+6 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Res Bond 1
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+3 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Res Bond 2
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Res Bond 3
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+5 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Res Bond 4
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Res during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Res Push 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Res Push 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Res Push 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Res Push 4
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Res+7, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

entries.name: Atk/Res Solo 1
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Res Solo 2
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Res Solo 3
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Spd 1
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+1.

entries.name: Atk/Spd 2
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+2.

entries.name: Atk/Spd Bond 1
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+3 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Spd Bond 2
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Spd Bond 3
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Spd Bond 4
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Spd Form 1
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

entries.name: Atk/Spd Form 2
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5.)

entries.name: Atk/Spd Form 3
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat. (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7.)

entries.name: Atk/Spd Push 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Spd Push 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Spd Push 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

entries.name: Atk/Spd Push 4
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+7, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

entries.name: Atk/Spd Solo 1
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Spd Solo 2
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat .

entries.name: Atk/Spd Solo 3
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 during combat .

entries.name: Attack/Def +1
entries.description: Grants Atk/Def+1.

entries.name: Attack/Def +2
entries.description: Grants Atk/Def+2.

entries.description: Grants Atk+1.

entries.name: Attack +2
entries.description: Grants Atk+2.

entries.description: Grants Atk+3.

entries.name: Attack/Res 1
entries.description: Grants Atk/Res+1.

entries.name: Attack/Res 2
entries.description: Grants Atk/Res+2.

entries.name: B Duel Flying 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: B Duel Flying 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: B Duel Flying 3
entries.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: B Duel Infantry 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: B Duel Infantry 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: B Duel Infantry 3
entries.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: Bonus Doubler 1
entries.description: Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = 50% of current bonus on each of unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

entries.name: Bonus Doubler 2
entries.description: Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = 75% of current bonus on each of unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

entries.name: Bonus Doubler 3
entries.description: Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

entries.name: Bracing Blow 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def/Res+2 during combat .

entries.name: Bracing Blow 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Bracing Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

entries.name: Bracing Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Atk/Def 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Def+3 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Atk/Def 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Def+5 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Atk/Def 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Def+7 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Res+3 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Res+5 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Atk/Res 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Res+7 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Spd+3 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk/Spd+7 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 4
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Atk+9 and Spd+10 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Def/Res 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Def/Res+3 during combat.

entries.name: Brazen Def/Res 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Def/Res+5 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Def/Res+7 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Def+3 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Def+7 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Res+3 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Res+5 during combat.

entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants Spd/Res+7 during combat.

entries.name: C Duel Infantry 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: C Duel Infantry 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: Close Counter
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

entries.name: Close Def 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

entries.name: Close Def 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Close Def 3
entries.description: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

entries.name: Darting Blow 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

entries.name: Darting Blow 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

entries.name: Darting Blow 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

entries.name: Darting Blow 4
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+9 during combat.

entries.name: Darting Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

entries.name: Darting Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

entries.name: Darting Stance 3
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

entries.name: Death Blow 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+2 during combat.

entries.name: Death Blow 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat.

entries.name: Death Blow 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

entries.name: Death Blow 4
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+8 during combat.

entries.name: Def/Res 1
entries.description: Grants Def/Res+1.

entries.name: Def/Res 2
entries.description: Grants Def/Res+2.

entries.name: Def/Res Bond 1
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+3 during combat .

entries.name: Def/Res Bond 2
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Def/Res Bond 3
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+5 during combat .

entries.name: Def/Res Solo 1
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+2 during combat .

entries.name: Def/Res Solo 2
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Def/Res Solo 3
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+6 during combat .

entries.name: Defense +1
entries.description: Grants Def+1.

entries.name: Defense +2
entries.description: Grants Def+2.

entries.name: Defense +3
entries.description: Grants Def+3.

entries.name: TD Defiant Atk 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+3 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Atk 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+5 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Atk 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+7 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Def 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+3 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Def 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+5 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Def 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+7 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Res 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+3 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Res 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+5 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Res 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+7 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Spd 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+3 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Spd 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+5 for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Defiant Spd 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+7 for 1 turn.

entries.name: Distant Counter
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

entries.name: Distant Def 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

entries.name: Distant Def 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Distant Def 3
entries.description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

entries.name: Distant Def 4
entries.description: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+8 and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: TDC Distant Ward
entries.description: If magic, staff, or dragonstone foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

entries.name: Dragonskin
entries.description: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Earth Boost 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+2 during combat.

entries.name: Earth Boost 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+4 during combat.

entries.name: Earth Boost 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+6 during combat.

entries.name: Fierce Breath
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Fierce Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+2 during combat .

entries.name: Fierce Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat .

entries.name: Fierce Stance 3
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat .

entries.name: Fire Boost 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+2 during combat.

entries.name: Fire Boost 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+4 during combat.

entries.name: Fire Boost 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Atk+6 during combat.

entries.name: Flashing Blade 1
entries.description: If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+5, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Flashing Blade 2
entries.description: If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+3, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Flashing Blade 3
entries.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Flashing Blade 4
entries.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown charge +1 and deals +5 damage per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Fort. Def/Res 1
entries.description: Grants Def/Res+3. Inflicts Atk-3.

entries.name: Fort. Def/Res 2
entries.description: Grants Def/Res+4. Inflicts Atk-3.

entries.name: Fort. Def/Res 3
entries.description: Grants Def/Res+6. Inflicts Atk-2.

entries.name: Fortress Def 1
entries.description: Grants Def+3. Inflicts Atk-3.

entries.name: Fortress Def 2
entries.description: Grants Def+4. Inflicts Atk-3.

entries.name: Fortress Def 3
entries.description: Grants Def+5. Inflicts Atk-3.

entries.name: Fortress Res 1
entries.description: Grants Res+3. Inflicts Atk-3.

entries.name: Fortress Res 2
entries.description: Grants Res+4. Inflicts Atk-3.

entries.name: Fortress Res 3
entries.description: Grants Res+5. Inflicts Atk-3.

entries.name: Fury 1
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+1. After combat, deals 2 damage to unit.

entries.name: Fury 2
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. After combat, deals 4 damage to unit.

entries.name: Fury 3
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat, deals 6 damage to unit.

entries.name: Fury 4
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4. After combat, deals 8 damage to unit.

entries.name: G Duel Flying 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: G Duel Flying 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: G Duel Flying 3
entries.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: G Duel Infantry 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: G Duel Infantry 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: G Duel Infantry 3
entries.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: Grani's Shield
entries.description: Neutralizes "effective against cavalry" bonuses.

entries.name: Heavy Blade 1
entries.description: If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk+5, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Heavy Blade 2
entries.description: If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk+3, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Heavy Blade 3
entries.description: If unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Heavy Blade 4
entries.description: If unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Special cooldown charge +1 and deals +5 damage to foe per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: HP/Atk 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3, Atk+1.

entries.name: HP/Atk 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4, Atk+2.

entries.name: HP/Def 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3, Def+1.

entries.name: HP/Def 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4, Def+2.

entries.name: HP +3
entries.description: Grants HP+3.

entries.name: HP +4
entries.description: Grants HP+4.

entries.name: HP +5
entries.description: Grants HP+5.

entries.name: HP/Res 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3, Res+1.

entries.name: HP/Res 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4, Res+2.

entries.name: HP/Spd 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3, Spd+1.

entries.name: HP/Spd 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4, Spd+2.

entries.name: Iote's Shield
entries.description: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.

entries.name: Kestrel Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat.

entries.name: Kestrel Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

entries.name: Laws of Sacae
entries.description: If foe initiates combat and the number of allies within 2 spaces ≥ 2, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Life and Death 1
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+3. Inflicts Def/Res-3.

entries.name: Life and Death 2
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4.

entries.name: Life and Death 3
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+5. Inflicts Def/Res-5.

entries.name: Life and Death 4
entries.description: Grants Atk/Spd+7. Inflicts Def/Res-5.

entries.name: Mirror Impact
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Res+10 during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Mirror Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat.

entries.name: Mirror Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Mirror Stance 3
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Mirror Strike 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat .

entries.name: Mirror Strike 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Ostian Counter
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

entries.name: R Duel Flying 1
entries.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: R Duel Flying 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.description: Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: R Duel Infantry 2
entries.description: Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's stats as 165 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: R Duel Infantry 3
entries.description: Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's stats as 170 in modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any values added by merges and skills.)

entries.name: Resistance +1
entries.description: Grants Res+1.

entries.name: Resistance +2
entries.description: Grants Res+2.

entries.name: Resistance +3
entries.description: Grants Res+3.

entries.name: TDC Scendscale
entries.description: Deals damage = 25% of unit's Atk, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage to unit.

entries.name: Sorcery Blade 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

entries.name: Sorcery Blade 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

entries.name: Sorcery Blade 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

entries.name: Spd/Def 1
entries.description: Grants Spd/Def+1.

entries.name: Spd/Def 2
entries.description: Grants Spd/Def+2.

entries.name: Spd/Def Bond 1
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+3 during combat .

entries.name: Spd/Def Bond 2
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat .

entries.name: Spd/Def Bond 3
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+5 during combat .

entries.name: Spd/Def Form 1
entries.description: Grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

entries.name: Spd/Def Form 2
entries.description: Grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5.)

entries.name: Spd/Def Form 3
entries.description: Grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat. (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7.)

entries.name: Spd/Def Solo 1
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+2 during combat .

entries.name: Spd/Def Solo 2
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat .

entries.name: Spd/Def Solo 3
entries.description: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+6 during combat .

entries.name: Spd/Res 1
entries.description: Grants Spd/Res+1.

entries.name: Spd/Res 2
entries.description: Grants Spd/Res+2.

entries.name: Spd/Res Bond 1
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+3 during combat .

entries.name: Spd/Res Bond 2
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Spd/Res Bond 3
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+5 during combat .

entries.name: Speed +1
entries.description: Grants Spd+1.

entries.name: Speed +2
entries.description: Grants Spd+2.

entries.name: Speed +3
entries.description: Grants Spd+3.

entries.name: Steady Blow 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+2 during combat .

entries.name: Steady Blow 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat .

entries.name: Steady Breath
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Steady Posture 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+2 during combat.

entries.name: Steady Posture 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat.

entries.name: Steady Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+2 during combat .

entries.name: Steady Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat .

entries.name: Steady Stance 3
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat .

entries.name: Steady Stance 4
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+8 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Sturdy Blow 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat .

entries.name: Sturdy Blow 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat .

entries.name: Sturdy Impact
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Def+10 during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Sturdy Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat.

entries.name: Sturdy Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

entries.name: Svalinn Shield
entries.description: Neutralizes "effective against armored" bonuses.

entries.name: Swift Sparrow 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat .

entries.name: Swift Sparrow 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat .

entries.name: Swift Sparrow 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Spd+7 during combat .

entries.name: Swift Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+2 during combat.

entries.name: Swift Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Swift Strike 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+2 during combat .

entries.name: Swift Strike 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Triangle Adept 1
entries.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 10%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 10%.

entries.name: Triangle Adept 2
entries.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 15%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 15%.

entries.name: Triangle Adept 3
entries.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.

entries.name: Warding Blow 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+2 during combat.

entries.name: Warding Blow 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Warding Blow 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+6 during combat.

entries.name: Warding Breath
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Warding Stance 1
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+2 during combat .

entries.name: Warding Stance 2
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat .

entries.name: Warding Stance 3
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+6 during combat .

entries.name: Warding Stance 4
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+8 during combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Water Boost 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+2 during combat.

entries.name: Water Boost 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+4 during combat.

entries.name: Water Boost 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Res+6 during combat.

entries.name: Wind Boost 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+2 during combat.

entries.name: Wind Boost 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+4 during combat.

entries.name: Wind Boost 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Spd+6 during combat.
